title: Battery percentage doesn't show up on the always on display.
content: I've restarted the phone multiple times, cleared the cache of both ambient services and the launcher, and tried turning AOD off and on. I still only see the battery indicator at the bottom of the screen when I press the power button and turn the screen on. The rest of the AOD shows up as normal.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
